block.p: Tara Alexis Lowenberg, the daughter of Dr. Marc Lowenberg of New York and the late Sandra Ross Lowenberg, was married last evening to Scott Isaac Lonker, the son of Lyn Lipschutz of Lambertville, N.J., and Michael Lonker of Los Angeles. Rabbi Jay Henry Moses officiated at the home of the bride's father in Water Mill, N.Y.
The bride, 32, will continue to use her name professionally. She is the president of TLCommunications, a public relations firm in Manhattan, and is a Columbia graduate.

Tara Alexis Lowenberg, the daughter of Dr. Marc Lowenberg of New York and the late Sandra Ross Lowenberg, was married last evening to Scott Isaac Lonker, the son of Lyn Lipschutz of Lambertville, N.J., and Michael Lonker of Los Angeles. Rabbi Jay Henry Moses officiated at the home of the bride's father in Water Mill, N.Y.
The bride, 32, will continue to use her name professionally. She is the president of TLCommunications, a public relations firm in Manhattan, and is a Columbia graduate.
The bridegroom, also 32, is an entertainment agent at the William Morris Agency in New York. He graduated from Rutgers.
